LinkList.Title: Strongly Typed Configuration Settings in ASP.NET Core
LinkList.Description: ASP.NET Core has a pluggable configuration system which supports a variety of different mechanisms for reading configuration data. The configuration extensions give you access to the required Configuration overload to map a strongly typed class to a configuration section in the configuration store.
